level1.3-15:
Welcome to Santa's Gift Quest!
Use WASD to move and jump.
Follow the signs to learn how to play!
level1.17-13: Hold W while standing over a ladder to climb.
level1.25-7:
Collect all the gifts within each level to progress!
You can see how many gift are remaining
at the bottom of the screen.
level1.45-5:
Nice work! You found a hidden christmas tree!
Try and find them all for points bonus.
level1.34-13:
DANGER:
BEWARE OF PENGUINS!
Tip: Jump on a penguin to destroy it.
level1.44-15:
Great job! You've completed the level
Stand on the sleigh after collecting all the presents
to move on to the next level!

level4.18-37:
Watch out!
Falling means certain death!
level4.44-32:
What do you get if you cross a snowman and a vampire?
Frostbite!
level4.12-28: If you ask me, I don't think it's worth the risk.

level5.46-36:
Are your ankles okay after
that fall?!
